message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to start with a price of $18000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I have to consider my own needs. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than $14000. I'm thinking of $16000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking of $17000. It's a fair price, considering the value this product brings. What do you think?
I understand you're trying to reach your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
